SELECT f_table.* FROM ( SELECT ts.*, c.BBS_NO, b.BBS_CONTENT, c.COMMENT, c.PARENT_COMMENT, p.PRO_FILEPATH FROM ( SELECT * FROM notic WHERE notic_receive_user = #{id} AND NOTIC_TYPE = 1 ) ts JOIN commentline c ON ts.TRIGGER_NO = c.C_NO JOIN bbs b ON c.bbs_no = b.bbs_no JOIN profile p ON ts.NOTIC_TRIGGER_USER = p.ID
UNION ALL
SELECT ts.*, NULL AS BBS_NO, b.BBS_CONTENT, NULL AS comment, NULL AS PARENT_COMMENT, p.PRO_FILEPATH FROM ( SELECT * FROM notic WHERE notic_receive_user = #{id} AND NOTIC_TYPE = 2 ) ts JOIN bbs b ON ts.TRIGGER_NO = b.BBS_NO JOIN profile p ON ts.NOTIC_TRIGGER_USER = p.ID
UNION ALL
SELECT ts.*, NULL AS BBS_NO, afl.AFML_NO AS BBS_CONTENT, afl.AFML_YN AS comment, NULL AS PARENT_COMMENT, p.PRO_FILEPATH FROM ( SELECT * FROM notic WHERE notic_receive_user = #{id} AND (NOTIC_TYPE = 3 OR NOTIC_TYPE = 4) ) ts JOIN add_friendmatelist afl ON CAST(REGEXP_REPLACE(afl.AFML_NO, '[^0-9]', '') AS UNSIGNED) = ts.TRIGGER_NO JOIN profile p ON ts.NOTIC_TRIGGER_USER = p.ID ) f_table ORDER BY notic_trigger_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE notic SET CHECKED_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE TRIGGER_PK = #{trigger_pk}
UPDATE add_friendmatelist SET AFML_YN = 'Y' WHERE CAST(REGEXP_REPLACE(AFML_NO, '[^0-9]', '') AS UNSIGNED) = #{trigger_no}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM add_friendmatelist WHERE CAST(REGEXP_REPLACE(AFML_NO, '[^0-9]', '') AS UNSIGNED) = #{trigger_no}
